landing.download.browserInfo: Your device isn't listed? qpost can be used on any device with a modern web browser installed.
landing.download.description: Get qpost - the open-source Twitter alternative for your device of choice.
landing.download.headline: Download
landing.download.windows.headline: qpost for Windows
landing.home.feature.1.description: Post what you think in an open-source community, free of censorship - qpost is built with true free speech in mind.
landing.home.feature.1.headline: Share your thoughts
landing.home.feature.2.description: No need to find servers or understand confusing systems. Create your account and start posting!
landing.home.feature.2.headline: Get started within 60 seconds
landing.home.feature.3.description: qpost is completely open-source, meaning you know exactly how it works and data is being used.
landing.home.feature.3.headline: Enjoy transparency
landing.home.headline: Time to get rid of Twitter and Mastodon.
landing.home.register.terms: By clicking Create account or Sign in with Gigadrive, you accept our %1%terms of service%2%.
landing.home.sponsors.headline: Sponsors
landing.home.subtitle.1: Free and open-source social network for all of your devices.
landing.home.subtitle.2: Take social networking back into your own hands, without the fear of censorship!

settings.account.delete.headline: Delete Your Account
settings.account.delete.line1: This will permanently delete all of your created content, including your posts, favorites, replies and follows.
settings.account.delete.line2: Cached content may still be available for a while.
settings.account.delete.line4: You will not be able to reactivate your account at all.
settings.account.information.delete: Click here if you wish to delete your account.
settings.account.information.headline: Account Information
settings.account.password.headline: Change Your Password
settings.account.privacy.headline: Privacy
settings.account.privacy.level.closed.de: only you can see your profile, nobody can interact with your content
settings.account.privacy.level.descripti: Choose who can see and interact with your content.
settings.account.privacy.level.private.d: only your followers can see your profile and interact with your content, new followers have to be confirmed
settings.account.privacy.level.public.de: everyone can see your profile and interact with your content
settings.account.sessions.headline: Active Sessions
settings.account.username.cooldownInfo: You can only change your username every 30 days.
settings.account.username.error.cooldown: You can only change your username every 30 days.
settings.account.username.error.invalidC: The username has to be alphanumeric.
settings.account.username.error.notAvail: That username is not available anymore.
settings.account.username.error.tooLong: The username cannot be longer than 16 characters.
settings.account.username.error.tooShort: The username has to be at least 3 characters long.
settings.account.username.headline: Change Your Username
settings.account.username.verificationIn: Changing your username results in losing your verified status.

settings.profile.appearance.error.birthd: You have to be at least 13 years old and at the most 120 years old.
settings.profile.appearance.error.displa: The display name must be between 1 and 24 characters long.
